CSI_PhyParams phyParams
 CSI PHY Parameters which can be overwritten by application developers to trim the PHY values. More...
 
CSI_VirtualChannelCfg virtualChannelCfg [CSI_VirtualCh_MAX_CHANNEL]
 Virtual channel configuration: This is a table which specifies all the virtual channels which need to be configured. If the channel id in the configuration is set to an invalid value the configuration for the channel is skipped.
 

Detailed Description

CSI Configuration.

The structure describes the configuration information which is needed to initialize and setup the CSI Driver.

Field Documentation

CSI_PhyParams CSI_Cfg_t::phyParams

CSI PHY Parameters which can be overwritten by application developers to trim the PHY values.

The PHY parameters can be set to the default values using the following API:

See also
CSI_phyParamsInit
